name: Death by Dawn
description: In a race against the encroaching twilight, Cendryn—Queen of the Vampires—flees from human soldiers. Cendryn had hoped for minimal bloodshed when she set out to save her longtime friend—though somewhat unreliable cohort—Civoti from the humans who had captured him. With daybreak growing ever closer, Cendryn is forced to show her pursuers the true power of the Blood Queen!
